message: We stop and check the area.

name: クリア
message: "Haa, haa, it's fine now. The police aren't following us anymore."
Clear is hunched over, panting. I lean against the wall to catch my breath.

name: 蒼葉
message: "How... do you know... they're not chasing us anymore?"

name: クリア
message: "I'd be able to hear their footsteps if they were."
Is his hearing really that good?

name: 蒼葉
message: "An invitation? Does that mean we can get into Platinum Jail?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "I got the same thing when Granny was kidnapped too."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah. Remember? That thing I mentioned about an old lady being abducted by bats."

name: 蒼葉
message: "After I got that, Granny was actually kidnapped. So I'm wondering if this might not be another warning or something."

name: クリア
message: "Well, we certainly can't eliminate the possibility. But the shadiness levels are off the charts, if you ask me."
I don't even know who's sending these. There's a good chance it's a trap.
But a cave, a treasure chest, a key, a door...
There's an image attached. A map of the Old Residential District.
A spot is marked in red on the left edge of the wall surrounding Platinum Jail.

name: 蒼葉
message: "We need to meet up with Mr. Haga. Let's get going."
